articles.title: Man fears losing $6000 deposit as Dream Cruises' World Dream stops sailing - AsiaOne
articles.description: A man who had plans to sail with Dream Cruises' World Dream now fears losing $6,000 in deposit after the ship ceased operations on Wednesday (March 2). Speaking to Shin Min Daily News, the 40-year-old said that he had arranged to take his mother and friends o…
articles.content:
A man who had plans to sail with Dream Cruises' World Dream now fears losing $6,000 in deposit after the ship ceased operations on Wednesday (March 2).

articles.title: Veteran TVB actress-host Samantha Chuk dies aged 55 - AsiaOne
articles.description: Veteran TVB artiste Samantha Chuk has died of lung cancer at age 55. In a Facebook post on Wednesday (March 2), TVB Entertainment News said the Hong Kong actress-host died at home in her sleep on Tuesday night surrounded by family. [embed]https://www.facebook…
